entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rocky Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.9°C

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:58 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:58 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
